data.title: Avex Inc.
data.meta_description: This is the corporate site of Avex Inc. Avex is a comprehensive entertainment company offering a wide range of services in the entertainment field with the philosophy of "delivering excitement to the world through ideas unbound by conventional wisdom."
data.text:
Sustainability

Contribution to future talent and undiscovered joy

Contribution to future talent and undiscovered joy

We believe in a prosperous future created by diverse talent and joy, and,

as an entertainment company, aim to create new value models that will contribute to a sustainable society.
